item.title: 激进分子埃利奥特希望结束英国石油公司 15 年来输给壳牌公司的局面
item.description: 几十年来，英国石油公司（BP Plc）和壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）一直是最亲密的竞争对手；两家公司规模相当，在能源市场的影响力不相上下，在全球的影响力也相差无几。【原文：For many decades, BP Plc and Shell Plc were the closest of rivals — equivalent in size, with matching clout in energy markets and similar global reach.】

item.title: 历峰集团在新一轮董事会人事变动中提升珠宝业大佬的职位
item.description: 历峰集团（Richemont）已将旗下两个最重要和最大的品牌的负责人晋升为主要管理委员会成员，这进一步表明该瑞士奢侈品集团的长期继任变化。【原文：Richemont has promoted the heads of its two most important and largest brands to the main management committee in a further sign of longer-term succession change at the Swiss luxury group.】

item.title: 日本最富有的 3% 人口资产增至创纪录的 3 万亿美元
item.description: 野村综合研究所（Nomura Research Institute Ltd.）的数据显示，日本富豪和超级富豪持有的资产价值已增至创纪录的 469 万亿日元（3.1 万亿美元），而该国大多数人持有的资产增长速度要慢得多。【原文：The value of assets held by Japan’s wealthy and uber wealthy has risen to a record ¥469 trillion ($3.1 trillion), while assets held by the majority of people in the country have grown at a much slower pace, according to Nomura Research Institute Ltd.】

item.title: 奢侈品增速放缓，爱马仕销售额大幅增长
item.description: 爱马仕的销售额攀升，原因是该奢侈品集团受益于假日购物季对其昂贵手袋的旺盛需求。【原文：Hermes sales climbed as the luxury group benefited from a strong appetite for its pricey handbags over the holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将迎来第三周上涨
估计显示芬兰第四季度经济增长乏力
item.description: 芬兰经济连续第四个季度勉强实现增长，预计今年将出现更明显的扩张。【原文：Finland’s economy eked out a gain for a fourth consecutive quarter ahead of a more pronounced expansion that is expected to follow this year.】

item.title: 中国邀请马云和 DeepSeek 创始人会见高层领导
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国已邀请包括阿里巴巴集团联合创始人马云在内的知名企业家与国家最高领导人会面，这可能是在多年动荡之后对私营部门的一次重要支持。【原文：China has invited prominent entrepreneurs including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. co-founder Jack Ma to meet the nation’s top leaders, people familiar with the matter said, a potentially momentous show of support for the private sector after years of turmoil.】

item.title: 越南希望安抚特朗普，誓言对美国商品不设限
item.description: 越南表示无意采取对美 "造成负担或限制贸易 "的措施，并 "准备开放市场，增加对美国农产品的进口"，以避免唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁。【原文：Vietnam says it has no intention of imposing measures that “create burdens or restrict trade” with the US, and is “ready to open its market, increasing imports of US agricultural products,” as it seeks to stave off Donald Trump’s tariff threats.】

item.title: 印度将增加从美国进口石油和液化天然气以规避关税
item.description: 印度正在寻求增加从美国进口石油和天然气，以努力减少两国之间的贸易不平衡，避免潜在的报复性关税。【原文：India is seeking to boost oil and gas imports from the US in an effort to reduce the trade imbalance between the two countries and avoid potential retaliatory tariffs.】

item.title: 国际能源机构称，全球用电量将大幅增加
item.description: 随着世界各地的人们使用更多电力来运行空调、工业和不断增长的数据中心，未来几年的电力需求将急剧增长。【原文：Electricity demand is set to increase sharply in the coming years as people around the world use more power to run air conditioners, industry and a growing fleet of data centers.】

item.title: 世界银行认为支出激增导致泰国财政风险上升
item.description: 世界银行称，泰国为推动经济增长而采取的扩张性财政政策战略面临着老年人护理、投资成本上升的风险，并且需要将公共债务水平保持在可持续的水平上。【原文：Thailand’s pursuit of an expansionary fiscal policy strategy to propel growth faces the risk of rising costs for elderly care, investment and the need to keep public debt level to sustainable levels, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 廉价鹰嘴豆引发印度买家违约
item.description: 在供应大量涌入后，来自头号出口国澳大利亚的鹰嘴豆的印度买家正在拖欠货款或试图重新谈判价格。【原文：Indian buyers of chickpeas from top exporter Australia are defaulting on cargoes or trying to renegotiate prices after an influx of supply.】

item.title: 据说贝恩接近以 40 亿欧元收购 PAI 支持的 Apleona 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本正在就收购德国设施管理公司 Apleona Group GmbH 进行深入谈判，交易价值约为 40 亿欧元（42 亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital is in advanced talks to acquire German facility management company Apleona Group GmbH in a deal valued at about €4 billion ($4.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在马克龙的法国，成为一名企业家变得很酷。但它能持久吗？
item.description:
随着有关首席执行官、财富和失败的污名逐渐消失，Mistral 和 H 等AI 的后起之秀激励了新一代创始人。【原文：

AI’s rising stars like Mistral and H have inspired a new generation of founders as the stigma around CEOs, wealth and failure fade.

item.title: 关税男再次出击，市场却视而不见
item.description:
他们认为仍有很大的谈判空间，但全面征税将是另一回事。【原文：

They still see plenty of room for negotiations, but across-the-board levies would be a different story.

item.description:
世界需要具体的安全承诺，而不是法国的投资建议。以下是一些想法。【原文：

item.title: 亚当-斯密会如何看待唐纳德-特朗普？
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money节目中，我们讨论了共和党对关税、税收和监管的态度，以及这是否符合经济学家对资本主义的定义。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, we discuss the Republican’s attitude toward tariffs, taxes and regulation, and whether it fits with the economist’s definition of capitalism.

item.title: 欧洲制药、汽车巨头面临的特朗普关税风险最大
item.description: 如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁成为现实，欧洲的盈利将面临巨大的阻力，而该地区的主要增长行业所面临的风险最大。【原文：European earnings face significant headwinds should US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats materialize, with the region’s key growth sectors the most exposed.】

item.title: 德国工业面临电力定价改革带来新挫折的风险
item.description: 当德国天气阴沉平静时，风车和太阳能发电厂不会向电网输送任何电力。相反，它们会给市场带来冲击波。在 12 月中旬的一个 "Dunkelflaute "日，现货电价攀升至每兆瓦时 900 多欧元（939 美元），比平均水平高出 9 倍。这甚至高于 2022 年的涨幅，当时乌克兰被入侵后，该国失去了使用俄罗斯管道天然气的机会。【原文：When the weather in Germany is overcast and calm, the windmills and solar plants don’t send any power to the grid. Instead, they send shockwaves through the markets. One such “Dunkelflaute” day in mid-December saw spot power prices climb to more than €900 ($939) per megawatt-hour – nine times above average. That’s even higher than the increases in 2022, when the nation lost access to Russian pipeline gas after the invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 俄罗斯央行将维持关键利率不变，关注新方法
item.description: 俄罗斯央行准备将借贷成本维持在创纪录的高位，因为政策制定者已将重点从毫不妥协地对抗通胀转向避免战争经济过度降温。【原文：Russia’s central bank is poised to hold borrowing costs at a record high after policymakers switched their focus from an uncompromising fight against inflation to avoiding an excessive cooling in the war economy.】

item.title: 中国医疗保健股因深度搜索整合潜力而大涨
item.description: 由于与人工智能产品 DeepSeek 的整合前景提振了对该行业前景的希望，一些中国医疗保健公司的股票反弹。【原文：Shares of some Chinese health-care companies rallied as prospects for integration with artificial-intelligence product DeepSeek boosted hopes for the sector’s outlook.】

item.title: Hexaware 10 亿美元印度首次公开募股难以找到竞标者
item.description: Hexaware Technologies Ltd.的首次公开募股可能是印度今年首个价值十亿美元的股票发行，但截至竞价期的最后一天，仅有约 15%的股票获得认购，很难锁定投资者。【原文：Hexaware Technologies Ltd.’s initial public offering, which may be India’s first billion-dollar float this year, is struggling to lock in investors with just around 15% of the issue subscribed up until the final day of the bidding period.】

item.title: 日本央行女董事提名获下议院批准
item.description: 日本国会下议院确认了小田顺子加入日本央行政策委员会，基本上确保了她将获得批准，这一进展支持了日本央行逐步提高基准利率的努力。【原文：Japan’s lower house of parliament confirmed Junko Koeda to join the Bank of Japan’s policy board, essentially ensuring she’ll be approved, in a development that supports the bank’s quest to raise its benchmark rate at a gradual pace.】

item.title: 楚丁告诉 NZZ，瑞士央行可能需要次零利率选项来引导法郎走势
item.description: 董事会成员 Petra Tschudin 表示，瑞士国家银行必须有能力将利率降至零以下，以有效控制本国货币的强势。【原文：The Swiss National Bank must have the ability to take interest rates below zero to efficiently control the strength of the national currency, according to board member Petra Tschudin.】

item.title: 杰富瑞警告本地投资者股票流入放缓
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：The torrent of retail funds flowing into India’s equity mutual funds is at risk of abating as market returns decline, according to Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 关税风险受质疑，市场闪现美元疲劳曙光
item.description: 越来越多的人猜测，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收新关税的主要目的是作为一种谈判工具，这破坏了押注美元的流行交易。【原文：Growing speculation the new tariffs threatened by US President Donald Trump are mainly intended as a negotiating tool are undermining the popular trade of betting on the dollar.】

item.title: 决策指南》：风险加剧，罗马尼亚将延长利率暂停期
item.description: 由于当地政治动荡和全球贸易紧张局势给罗马尼亚通胀预测带来的风险不断增加，罗马尼亚央行可能在第四次会议上维持利率不变。【原文：Romania’s central bank is likely to hold interest rates for a fourth meeting as risks to its inflation forecast pile up from local political turmoil and global trade tensions.】

item.title: 大米价格飙升 82%，日本将紧急供应大米
item.description: 日本将从紧急库存中出售 21 万吨大米，因为家庭正在以创纪录的价格购买大米。【原文：Japan will sell 210,000 tons of rice from its emergency stockpiles as households are paying record prices for the grain.】

item.title: JX Advanced 首次公开募股募资 30 亿美元，创日本 2018 年以来最大纪录
item.description: 一家重要的全球半导体材料供应商正在寻求首次公开募股，以筹集约 4600 亿日元（约合 30 亿美元）的资金，这将是日本自 2018 年以来最大的此类交易。【原文：An initial public offering from a key global supplier of semiconductor materials is seeking to raise about ¥460 billion ($3 billion) in what would be Japan’s biggest such deal since 2018.】

item.title: 苹果公司计划在今年年中对中国 iPhone 进行人工智能改造
item.description: 苹果公司正努力在今年年中之前将其人工智能功能引入中国，从而加快了这项复杂工作的进程。【原文：Apple Inc. is working to bring its AI features to China by the middle of this year, accelerating a complex undertaking that has required software changes and deep reliance on local partners.】
